DOC.brief_summary: This equivalence study compare electric nebulizer human-powered nebulizer -- one need electricity -- treatment mild moderate asthma exacerbation regional clinic San Salvador , El Salvador .
DOC.detailed_description: The study design treat individual suffer mild moderate exacerbation asthma nebulized salbutamol ( 2.5mg ) . Subjects receive nebulization use either electric nebulizer compressor human-powered nebulizer compressor . Improvement peak expiratory flow primary endpoint . Blood oxygenation level measure pulse oximetry secondary endpoint trial .
